resources.string: This app serves as a wish list, where you can freely update, add or even delete unwanted items. To save time on researching for the cheapest price of the item that you wish to have, the location of the source can also be added when adding in a new item. \n\nA rating bar is also implemented, hence you can rate the item on how much you want it and you can also filter for items with 4 to 5 ratings. This will help you save time as you would not need to scroll all the way down to find your most wanted items.
Click on the + button to add an item, or Click on an specific item to either update or delete.
You can also filter items with 5 stars only by clicking the "Get items with 5 stars" button.
How much do you want it?
Enter source of cheapest price found
